name: Notice.AAA6.CP.Trial.Arrangements.Finalised.NotifyOtherParty.Defendant
titleEn: The other side has confirmed their trial arrangements
titleCy: Mae'r parti arall wedi cadarnhau eu trefniadau treial
descriptionEn: You can view the arrangements that they've confirmed.
descriptionCy: Gallwch weld y trefniadau y maent wedi'u cadarnhau.
